meanings.definition: Resembling soap in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The bubbles in the bath were soaplike and frothy.
meanings.sent2: Her hands felt soaplike after using the moisturizing lotion.
meanings.sent3: The soaplike clouds in the sky seemed to be floating on a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The artist used soaplike colors to create a calming and serene painting.
meanings.sent5: The soaplike petals of the flower glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The detergent left a soaplike scent on the freshly washed clothes.
meanings.sent2: The new cleaning product promised a soaplike cleaning experience.
meanings.sent3: The soaplike bubbles from the dishwasher filled the kitchen with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a soaplike quality, light and bubbly.
meanings.sent5: The soaplike texture of the lotion made her skin feel smooth and refreshed.
